com.att.ads.sample
Class GPSListener

java.lang.Object
  com.att.ads.sample.GPSListener

public class GPSListener
extends java.lang.Object

This class for the GPS enabling and disabling . getting the location of the device. there two ways for getting the location.one is the NETWORK PROVIDER other is GPS PROVIDER. Both the permission should be declare in manifest. Allows an application to access coarse (e.g., Cell-ID, WiFi) location Allows an application to access (e.g., GPS) location
